audio_description: Hi, hello, welcome back to our channel! This Sunday I am going to show you how to make Dindigul special Talapakatti Chicken Biryani. This biryani will be spicy with a unique flavor, so let’s see how to prepare this Dindigul biryani.

audio_description: Before preparing the Dindigul Talapakatti Biryani, take half a cup of chopped onions, half a green chili, some ginger, garlic, a little coriander, and a quarter cup of mint leaves in a mixer jar and grind them to a paste.

audio_description: Biryani masala is ready. Next, to prepare the biryani, heat half a cup of oil and 2 tablespoons of ghee in a vessel. Add the ground paste and sauté well until the raw smell disappears.
